title: A scrappy story-sharing tool with local newsroom DNA gains traction
description: Local news organizations can’t be everywhere at once. But even as they slim down, they have column inches and homepages to fill. National wire services can be prohibitively expensive (and less useful as places like the Associated Press reduce their coverage) for small outlets. Services like AP StoryShare or INN’s On the Ground are designed...
